page.title: 09EDUCATION:PRIMARY
page.content: With more people coming to and leaving areas such as ours than ever before, universally excepted qualifications are essential. This is reflected in Norfolk County Council's decision of the last decade to implement a fully Comprehensive system of education consisting of First School(4-8) Middle Schools(8-12), High School(12-16) and Sixth Form Colleges like Paston in North Walsham for further education. Both a First School and a High School lay within our D-Block and both reflect these changes. {PRIMARY EDUCATION The First School has 136 pupils. There are 5 teachers and 2 on supply. There is no set time-table,just a start and finish to the day, 2 breaks and the lunch hour. During lesson time, children do different subjects at different levels,
